PropertyDef.Name: FoulingFactor
PropertyDef.Definition: Fouling factor of the tubes in the tube bundle.

PropertyDef.Name: HasTurbulator
PropertyDef.Definition: TRUE if the tube has a turbulator, FALSE if it does not.

PropertyDef.Name: HorizontalSpacing
PropertyDef.Definition: Horizontal spacing between tubes in the tube bundle.

PropertyDef.Name: InsideDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: Actual inner diameter of the tube in the tube bundle.

PropertyDef.Name: Length
PropertyDef.Definition: Length of the tubes in the tube bundle.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal diameter or width of the tubes in the tube bundle.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfCircuits
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of parallel fluid tube circuits.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfRows
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of tube rows in the tube bundle assembly.

PropertyDef.Name: OutsideDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: Actual outside diameter of the tube in the tube bundle.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1').

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).

PropertyDef.Name: ThermalConductivity
PropertyDef.Definition: The thermal conductivity of the tube.

PropertyDef.Name: VerticalSpacing
PropertyDef.Definition: Vertical spacing between tubes in the tube bundle.

PropertyDef.Name: Volume
PropertyDef.Definition: Total volume of fluid in the tubes and their headers.
